name: WKNavigationAction
desc: An object that contains information about an action that causes navigation to occur.

items.name: var navigationType: WKNavigationType
items.desc: The type of action that triggered the navigation.

items.name: enum WKNavigationType
items.desc: The type of action that triggered the navigation.

items.name: var request: URLRequest
items.desc: The URL request object associated with the navigation action.

items.name: var sourceFrame: WKFrameInfo
items.desc: The frame that requested the navigation.

items.name: var targetFrame: WKFrameInfo?
items.desc: The frame in which to display the new content.

items.name: var buttonNumber: Int
items.desc: The number of the mouse button that caused the navigation request.

items.name: var modifierFlags: NSEvent.ModifierFlags
items.desc: The modifier keys that were pressed at the time of the navigation request.
